subject: Delivery of Your ATM (MASTE
body:
Delivery of Your ATM (MASTER) Card,
Be informed that after the investigations into some irregular payments
by the bank, the government of federal republic of Nigeria in
conjunction with the apex Bank of America, has formalized arrangements
to commence the payment of your outstanding payment of $1,500,000.00
(One million five hundred thousand United State Dollars only) to you
through this esteem bank, by ATM master card.
By this new payment arrangement, you are to enjoy less costs as your
payment has already been approved to be loaded into a MASTER (ATM)
card which will be delivered to you at your preferred destination in
your country. The ATM card you will access your funds from any ATM in
over 170 countries and can be used at P.O.S  globally.
So go ahead and furnish us with the following information below for
accurate delivery without mistakes:
1. Your full names....................................................
2. Delivering address P.O.BOX not accepted............................
3. Country/State......................................................
4. Occupation.........................................................
5. Telephone number...................................................
6. Age................................................................
7. Have you ever receive ATM card before..............................
The receipt of the above-listed requirements by our ATM master Card
Unit assures safe delivery of your loaded ATM card to your destination
within 72 hours.Take note that as soon as the parcel is on transit
your tracking number will be forward to you so that it will enable you
to track your package over there and know when it will get to your
address. Let me repeat again, try and reconfirm your delivery
information as soon as you receive this email to avoid any further
delay and take note that your pin code of your ATM master card is
(((7864))) do not expose it to anybody. And try to call me, as soon as
you receive this email, so that I will be rest assured that this
message get to you safety. Accept our congratulations.
Faithfully yours
MR.KEN TAYLOR

subject: Re:    Delivery of Your ATM (MASTE
body:
Dear Taylor,

Thank you for your email. I am excited to hear about the ATM Master Card. However, I would like to clarify a few things before we proceed.

1. Could you please provide more details about the irregular payments by the bank that led to this decision?
2. How was my name chosen for this payment? 
3. What security measures are in place to ensure that my ATM Master Card will be delivered safely and only used by me?

Once these questions are answered, I will be happy to provide the information you requested.

Best wishes,
Justin
